The World Cup 2022 winners, Argentina, have failed to dislodge Brazil from the top of the Fifa mens world rankings as England remain fifth in the post-Qatar standings.

articles.title: Kylian Mbappe will have last laugh over Emiliano Martinez after World Cup controversy - Express
articles.description: Kylian Mbappe has been mocked by Emiliano Martinez after Argentina beat France in the World Cup final on Sunday.

articles.title: Ipswich Town: EFL say Blues can't join #NoHomeKit campaign - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: Ipswich Town will be wearing blue on Boxing Day after the EFL ruled that they could not fully join Shelter's #NoHomeKit campaign.
